name: bodyblock-conversion
description: ANVA bodyblock omzetten naar excel files / gewenst fo notatie

scripts.test-to-pbcopy: ts-node src/bin/index.ts -i test/excel/main.xlsx -o test/excel/new.xlsx -d test/source | pbcopy
scripts.demo-5000: npm run compile && node lib/src/bin/index.js -i test/excel/main.xlsx -o test/excel/new.xlsx -d formulieren/05000
scripts.do-01000: npm run compile && node lib/src/bin/index.js -i formulieren/01000.xlsx -o formulieren/01000.xlsx -d formulieren/01000
scripts.do-02000: npm run compile && node lib/src/bin/index.js -i formulieren/02000.xlsx -o formulieren/02000.xlsx -d formulieren/02000
scripts.do-03000: npm run compile && node lib/src/bin/index.js -i formulieren/03000.xlsx -o formulieren/03000.xlsx -d formulieren/03000
scripts.do-05000: npm run compile && node lib/src/bin/index.js -i formulieren/05000.xlsx -o formulieren/05000.xlsx -d formulieren/05000
scripts.do-06000: npm run compile && node lib/src/bin/index.js -i formulieren/06000.xlsx -o formulieren/06000.xlsx -d formulieren/06000
scripts.do-09000: npm run compile && node lib/src/bin/index.js -i formulieren/09000.xlsx -o formulieren/09000.xlsx -d formulieren/09000

author: Jelte Dirks
